about_the_game:
Enhance your Isonzo experience by requisitioning a variety of cosmetic Unit Pack DLCs with the Wave sets!

Third Wave includes a varied set of cosmetic DLCs.
Available now:

The ‘Altitude Units’ pack contains clothing for the extreme cold of high altitude Alpine Warfare. There are fur lined coats, thick boots, unique jackets, and dedicated ski uniforms, along with headgear variants, mustaches, goggles, pipes, and new faces.

The ‘Shellshocked Units’ pack contains battleworn uniforms and items. It includes torn and patched up clothing, ersatz equipment, stripped down uniforms with only the essentials, and bloodied faces with hastily bandaged wounds.

Coming later: Third cosmetic DLC

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
Gore and blood can be disabled completely with an in-game setting.

short_description: From specialist high-altitude combat uniforms to exhausted and bloody late war veterans and ersatz troops, the Third Wave contains a broad variety of cosmetic options for Italian and Austro-Hungarian forces. It will also include a third DLC to be announced in the future!
